member.name: M:Voyage.Terraingine.SmoothVertices.Driver.Dispose(System.Boolean)

member.name: M:Voyage.Terraingine.SmoothVertices.Driver.SmoothVertices(System.Int32)
member.summary: Smooths the vertices in the TerrainPatch based upon a box-filtering method of averaging nearby vertices.
member.param: Number of adjacent vertices that affect the smoothing.

member.name: M:Voyage.Terraingine.SmoothVertices.Driver.numVertices_ValueChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Checks that the number of adjacent vertices is not more than the current size of the TerrainPatch.
